data.title: in Tutor job offers in Saint
data.meta_description: Looking for Au Pair and Live-in Tutor jobs in the City of Saint-Maurice, Valais, Switzerland. Here is the list of available Au Pair and Live-in Tutor jobs in the City of Saint-Maurice, Valais
data.text:
Visa Not Required

Au Pair Job in Saxon, Valais Switzerland in Village for 12-24 Months

❱ 1000 CHF per month

❱ Nov 2022 - Nov 2024 (12-24 Months)

❱ 2 Children (1 - 5 years old, 6 - 10 years old)

At AuPair.com you can get to know Hicham's family coming from Saxon (Village), Switzerland looking for Au Pair. The family is of French origin and speaks English, French & Spanish on a daily basis. The family of Hicham is made up of 4 people and includes 2 children (1 - 5 years old, 6 - 10 years old). They would like to hire an Au Pair and start the program - the start date is from Nov 2022 to ...

Konrad's family is of 4 people and includes 2 children (6 - 10 years old). The family would like to start the Au Pair program - the start date is from Aug 2024 to Sep 2024. The family needs the Au Pair for around 6-12 Months.
